item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Kay,
Sorry just spotted this! The ones I bought were in multipacks of 3, but that's the beauty of this recipe - if you have a little too much you can add more rice krispies and vice versa!
Hope you enjoyed them! Katie
item.content:encoded:
Hi Kay,

Sorry just spotted this! The ones I bought were in multipacks of 3, but that’s the beauty of this recipe – if you have a little too much you can add more rice krispies and vice versa!

Hope you enjoyed them!
Katie

Katie

item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Jen,
I'll be honest, they've never lasted long enough to go into the freezer, but they are pretty robust I can't see any reason why freezing them wouldn't work, let me know how it goes if you do!
Katie :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jen,

I’ll be honest, they’ve never lasted long enough to go into the freezer, but they are pretty robust I can’t see any reason why freezing them wouldn’t work, let me know how it goes if you do!

Katie ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Louise
item.dc:creator: Louise
item.description: I've made these twice now. They never last very long in my house as they are so delicious. Definately not good on the waistline though. Very easy to make. Ideal for the kids to help out with.
item.content:encoded: I’ve made these twice now. They never last very long in my house as they are so delicious. Definately not good on the waistline though. Very easy to make. Ideal for the kids to help out with.
